name: Charlemagne
what_did:
Charlemagne united much of Western Europe under one rule.
He was crowned 'Emperor of the Romans' by the Pope.
He built schools and helped protect learning and culture during a tough time.
why_matters:
Charlemagne helped shape the idea of Europe.
He showed how a ruler could support both learning and faith.
Many later kings looked to him as a model of good leadership.
